input.sentences: crafts shows can be an interesting place to shop
you never know what you will find and like
but fun is usually had by all
output.sentences: I saw a sign for a candle sale and I was intrigued.
It wasn't just the sign but also the brilliant artwork on the side of the building that intrigued me.
In fact, almost every building was covered in colorful artwork.
Up on a telephone pole I noticed a strange contraption.
When I got back to the hotel and into my hammock I wondered what it might have been.
